item.title: Prince Andrew to lose 'prince' title and move out of the royal lodge, Buckingham Palace confirms
item.description: <p>&quot;Today, an ordinary American girl from an ordinary American family, brought down a British prince.&quot;</p>

item.title: Rapist former MP jailed after sexually assaulting men
item.description: <p>Former Kiama state MP Gareth Ward was found guilty of sexual intercourse without consent and three indecent assaults in July following a NSW District Court trial.</p>

item.title: Heartbroken dad says late son would be 'stoked' with touching cricket tributes
item.description: <p>Australia&#x27;s top cricketers have taken part in a touching tribute to Ben Austin, the 17-year-old who died following a tragic training mishap in the nets earlier this week.</p>

item.title: BoM backflips on controversial rain radar on new website
item.description: <p>Instead of showing the &quot;rain rate&quot; in millimetres per hour, the radar will now go back to showing &quot;rain reflectivity&quot;, which was what was standard on the old website.</p>

item.title: Accused murderer to stand trial after teen's body found at rubbish tip
item.description: <p>An accused murderer has been committed to stand trial over the death of a woman whose body was later found at a rubbish tip.</p>

item.title: Cheers as historic treaty with First Nations people passes Victorian parliament
item.description: <p>Victoria has become the first state in the nation to legislate a treaty with its Indigenous people.</p>

item.title: 'Deeply devastating': Community mourns five-year-old girl killed in crash outside Sydney primary school
item.description: <p>Floral tributes have been laid outside of a primary school in Sydney&#x27;s north-west after a child was hit by a ute coming out of a driveway yesterday afternoon.</p>

item.title: New 'chill out zone' at Burleigh Heads to keep youth safe
item.description: <p>A new youth checkpoint, similar to those implemented during Schoolies celebrations, has been established in Burleigh Heads.</p>

item.title: Qantas resumes international flights to Adelaide after more than a decade
item.description: <p>Adelaide Airport has marked the resumption of international Qantas flights after more than a decade, with the inaugural Adelaide to Auckland service departing this morning. </p>

item.title: Snowtown killer's parole appeal hearing to be heard in secret
item.description: <p>A date has been set for a hearing on a bid to block the youngest Snowtown serial killer from being released on parole, but it will be shrouded in secrecy.</p>

item.title: No sign of missing four-year-old after police drain large dam in renewed search
item.description: <p>Police have drained a large dam on the remote SA homestead where Gus Lamont vanished just over a month ago.</p>

item.title: Woman arrested after tyres slashed on dozens of cars on southern Gold Coast
item.description: <p>Parked cars between Palm Beach, Currumbin, Kirra, Bilinga and Coolangatta had tyres slashed at some time between 9pm last night and 6am this morning, police have confirmed.</p>

item.title: 'Taken away in a minute': Family, community in shock after woman killed in lightning strike
item.description: <p>P﻿aramedics were called to Mary River Road in Cooroy after the lightning strike outside a sporting complex.</p>

item.title: Severe storm warnings for Ipswich, Lockyer and Sunshine Coast
item.description: <p>S﻿outh-east Queensland and northern New South Wales will be in the firing line of severe thunderstorms throughout this afternoon and tomorrow, with the potential to develop isolated tornadoes over the next 24 hours.</p>

item.title: Woman charged with murder over the death of an eight-month-old baby in Perth's south
item.description: <p>T﻿he eight-month-old was found dead at a home about 40km south of Perth. </p>

item.title: Royal prerogative: King Charles III banishes Andrew to buttress the House of Windsor's foundations
item.description: <p>No one is bigger than the monarchy. Not even the King&#x27;s brother. In the end, that reality spelled the end of Andrew&#x27;s life as a prince of the realm.</p>

item.title: Investigation into police actions under way after motorcyclist hospitalised in NSW Hunter region
item.description: <p>T﻿he 28-year-old remains in hospital today and is expected to be downgraded from a serious condition this afternoon.﻿</p>

item.title: Politicians demand Andrew be questioned after being swiftly removed from Roll of Peerage
item.description: <p>Pressure has now turned to having the royal answer to UK parliament, while others are calling for him to be questioned in the US by the FBI on his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.</p>

item.title: 9News - Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world
item.description: Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world

item.title: Australian National Weather Forecast
item.description: National weather forecast for Australia including capital city temperatures, rain radar maps, satellite images, synoptic chart, and weather warnings
